    • Uses of ISearchMonitor in solver

      Methods in solver with parameters of type ISearchMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Solver.plugMonitor(ISearchMonitor sm)
      Put a search monitor to react on search events (solutions, decisions, fails, ...)

    • Uses of ISearchMonitor in solver.constraints.nary.nogood

      Classes in solver.constraints.nary.nogood that implement ISearchMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NogoodStoreFromRestarts
      A constraint for the specific Nogood store designed to store ONLY positive decisions.
      class  NogoodStoreFromSolutions
      Avoid exploring same solutions (useful with restart on solution) Beware : - Must be posted as a constraint AND plugged as a monitor as well - Cannot be reified - Only works for integer variables This can be used to remove similar/symmetric solutions

    • Uses of ISearchMonitor in solver.explanations

      Classes in solver.explanations that implement ISearchMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FlattenedRecorderExplanationEngine
      Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
      class  LazyExplanationEngineFromRestart
      A explanation engine that works in a lazy way.
      class  RecorderExplanationEngine
      Created by IntelliJ IDEA.

    • Uses of ISearchMonitor in solver.explanations.strategies

      Classes in solver.explanations.strategies that implement ISearchMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConflictBasedBackjumping
      This class describes operations to execute to perform Conflict-based back jumping.
      class  DynamicBacktracking
      A dynamic backtracking algorithm.
      class  ExplainingCut
      a specific neighborhood for LNS based on the explanation of the cut imposed by a new solution.
      class  ExplainingObjective
      a specific neighborhood for LNS based on the explanation of the objective variable.
      class  PGN4Explanation

      class  RandomNeighborhood4Explanation
      This class extends RandomNeighborhood, but, instead of instantiating variables to values, it builds a fake decision path, this enables plugging explanation in.
      class  RPGN4Explanation

    • Uses of ISearchMonitor in solver.search.limits

      Subinterfaces of ISearchMonitor in solver.search.limits 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ICounter
      An interface to define count smth during search process
      Classes in solver.search.limits that implement ISearchMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ACounter

      class  BacktrackCounter
      Set a limit over the number of backtracks allowed during the search.
      class  FailCounter
      Set a limit over the number of fails allowed during the search.
      class  NodeCounter
      Set a limit over the number of nodes opened allowed during the search.
      class  SolutionCounter
      Set a limit over the number of found solutions allowed during the search.
      class  ThreadTimeCounter
      Set a limit over the search time.
      class  TimeCounter
      A limit over run time.

    • Uses of ISearchMonitor in solver.search.loop.monitors

      Subinterfaces of ISearchMonitor in solver.search.loop.monitors 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IMonitorClose
      An interface to monitor close operation of the search loop
      interface  IMonitorContradiction
      An interface to monitor contradiction in search loop
      interface  IMonitorDownBranch
      An interface to monitor down branch actions in the search loop
      interface  IMonitorInitialize
      An interface to monitor the initialization action of the search loop
      interface  IMonitorInitPropagation
      An interface to monitor the initial propagation of the search loop
      interface  IMonitorInterruption
      An interface to monitor interruption of the search loop
      interface  IMonitorOpenNode
      An interface to monitor open node action in the search loop
      interface  IMonitorRestart
      An interface to monitor restart instruction in the search loop
      interface  IMonitorSolution
      An interface to monitor solution instruction in the search loop
      interface  IMonitorUpBranch
      An interface to monitor up branch actions in the search loop

      Implementation of the search described in: "Activity-Based Search for Black-Box Constraint Propagramming Solver", Laurent Michel and Pascal Van Hentenryck, CPAIOR12.
      class  ImpactBased
      Implementation of the search described in: "Impact-Based Search Strategies for Constraint Programming", Philippe Refalo, CP2004.
